```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head = df.head()
    description = df.describe()
    return [head, description]
    print(df.head())

result = preview_data(data)
preview_data(data)
```
